entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
